content.title: 1. Information Collection
content.content: We collect information that you provide directly to us, including when you create an account, use our services, or contact us for support. This may include your name, email address, and usage data.

content.title: 2. Use of Information
content.content: We use the information we collect to provide, maintain, and improve our services, to develop new features, and to protect us and our users.

content.title: 3. Data Security
content.content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized or unlawful processing, accidental loss, destruction, or damage.

content.title: 4. Data Sharing
content.content: We do not sell your personal information. We may share your information with third parties only in the following circumstances: with your consent, with our service providers, or when required by law.

content.title: 5. Your Rights
content.content: You have the right to access, correct, or delete your personal information. You can also object to or restrict certain processing of your information.

content.title: 6. Cookies
content.content: We use cookies and similar technologies to provide and support our services. You can control cookie settings through your browser preferences.

content.title: 7. Changes to Policy
content.content: We may update this privacy policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new policy on this page.
